Metadata.title: Projectude — Manage your projects practically, quickly, and efficiently.
Metadata.description: Organize and boost your projects with Projectude. Try it for free or unlock its full potential with plans starting from $0.75/month.

Hero.title: Organize your projects the right way.
Hero.description: Manage, collaborate, and empower your team with a powerful and intuitive platform.
Hero.subDescription: Turn your ideas into reality! Projectude offers a modern platform for complete project management, team collaboration, and detailed information control.

Features.title: Why choose Projectude?
Features.description: A complete platform to take your projects to the next level, with tools designed for you.
Features.managementDesc: Take care of every detail of your projects.
Features.reportsDesc: Track your progress with smart visualizations.

Functionalities.title: Powerful Functionalities
Functionalities.description: Explore the tools that make Projectude the ideal choice for you and your team.
Functionalities.dashboardDesc: Monitor the progress of your projects with a complete and dynamic view. Receive notifications, track performance graphs, and visualize real-time information.
Functionalities.dashboardBenefit3: Integrated notification system for important events
Functionalities.projectManagementDesc: Organize all the details of your projects with custom fields, visual statuses, quick links, files, and much more. Total control, from start to finish.
Functionalities.projectManagementBenefit1: Complete registration with logo, cover, description, and status
Functionalities.projectManagementBenefit3: Management of multiple links and access credentials
Functionalities.commentsDesc: Facilitate communication with your team. Assign tasks, organize comments by status, and track responses in real time, all in a simple and visual way.
Functionalities.commentsBenefit1: Comments linked to projects and collaborators
Functionalities.commentsBenefit2: Organization by status: pending, in progress, paused, or completed
Functionalities.commentsBenefit3: Attachments and direct replies in comments
Functionalities.tagsDesc: Categorize, organize, and filter your projects practically. Create custom tags to optimize your navigation and speed up the search for important information.
Functionalities.tagsBenefit1: Creation and customization of tags by color and description
Functionalities.tagsBenefit2: Quick search for projects and tasks using tags
Functionalities.helpCenterDesc: Questions? Count on a modern and accessible center. FAQs, practical tutorials, and complete support to answer your questions and speed up your work.
Functionalities.helpCenterBenefit3: Efficient search center with popular topics

Pricing.title: Flexible Plans and Pricing
Pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Start for free or unlock the full potential.
Pricing.freeDesc: Basic features to get you started.
Pricing.freeSubDesc: Access to all features, except creating and managing projects.
Pricing.premiumSubDesc: Full access to all features, including unlimited project creation and management.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: What our users say
Testimonials.description: See how Projectude is helping people and teams achieve their goals more efficiently.
Testimonials.testimonial1: With Projectude, my projects gained a new life! Organization became much easier and more intuitive.
Testimonials.testimonial2: Very easy to use, perfect for small and medium-sized teams. Collaboration flows naturally, and the reports are great.
Testimonials.testimonial3: The visual reports helped me understand where we can improve. Indispensable tool for freelancers!

FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Have questions? Here are some of the most common questions we receive.
FAQ.faq1_question: What is the difference between the Free and Premium licenses?
FAQ.faq1_answer: The Free plan offers basic features to start your projects, allowing you to view projects as a guest, but without the ability to create or manage your own. The Premium plan unlocks unlimited access to all features, including project creation and management, advanced collaboration, and priority support, ideal for larger teams and projects.
FAQ.faq2_question: Can I use Projectude for SaaS projects?
FAQ.faq2_answer: Yes! Projectude is flexible and can be adapted to manage various types of projects, including Software as a Service (SaaS) development, marketing projects, event planning, and much more.
FAQ.faq3_question: Is it possible to customize the platform's appearance?
FAQ.faq3_answer: Currently, interface customization is limited to light and dark theme options, ensuring a consistent visual experience. We are always working to add more customization options in the future.
FAQ.faq4_question: What is the scope of the support offered?
FAQ.faq4_answer: Community support is available to all users through the Help Center for all plans. Premium subscribers have access to priority email support for quick resolution of doubts and technical problems related to the platform.
FAQ.faq5_question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
FAQ.faq5_answer: We offer a full refund policy for paid plans within the first 7 days after the initial subscription. If Projectude does not meet your expectations, please contact our support to request a refund.

CTA.title: Ready to elevate your project management?
CTA.description: Create your account in minutes and start today! Join thousands of satisfied users and transform the way you work.
CTA.subtext: Start for free. No credit card required.

Footer.tagline: Modern project management for teams of all sizes.

footer.title: Modern project management for teams of all sizes.

terms.title: Projectude Platform Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Projectude! By accessing or using our platform (www.projectude.com), you agree to these Terms of Service (“Terms”), which govern the use of the project management system offered by Projectude. Please read them carefully.

items.user: User: Any individual or legal entity who creates an account on Projectude.
items.project: Project: A set of information registered in the system, created or shared by users.
items.collaborator: Collaborator: A user invited to contribute to one or more projects.
items.service: Service: Features provided by the platform such as dashboards, comments, filters, among others.

2.title: 2. Use of the Platform
2.intro: Projectude provides a modern and responsive environment for project management with the following features:

features.item1: Creation, editing, and sharing of projects.
features.item3: Comments assigned with status and replies.
features.item4: Application of tags, filters, and performance charts.
features.item5: Dark/light mode, help center, and notifications.

2.warning: Improper use of the platform, such as sending spam, fraudulent data usage, or any activity that compromises service security and stability, will result in account suspension or deletion.

3.title: 3. User Account
3.text: By registering, the user agrees to provide true and up-to-date information. The account is personal and non-transferable. It is the user’s responsibility to maintain the confidentiality of their credentials.

4.title: 4. Plans and Payments
4.text1: Projectude may offer free and paid plans, whose prices, features and limitations will be clearly described under 'Settings > Plans'.
4.text2: Payments are processed via credit card, with viewing and history accessible to the user.
4.text3: Lack of payment may result in limited account features.

5.title: 5. Sharing and Collaboration
5.text: Users can share projects with other members using the 'Shared with me' and 'Collaborators' features. Each collaborator may have different permissions defined by the project creator.

6.title: 6. Comments and Archiving
6.text: All comments within projects must be respectful and objective. Projectude is not responsible for opinions or content generated by users, but reserves the right to intervene in case of policy violations.

7.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
7.text: Projectude respects user privacy. Registration data, projects, and interactions will be handled according to our Privacy Policy, in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD).

8.title: 8. Limitations of Liability
8.text: Projectude is not responsible for direct or indirect losses, service interruptions, data loss, or system misuse by the user. While we follow best security practices, we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.

9.title: 9. Changes to the Terms
9.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Continued use of the platform after changes implies acceptance of the new terms.

10.title: 10. Support and Contact
10.intro: Questions or problems with the platform? Our team is ready to help:

sections.acceptance: By using Projectude, you fully agree to these Terms of Service.

privacy-police.title: Privacy Policy of the Projectude Platform
privacy-police.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when you use the Projectude platform, accessible at www.projectude.com.
privacy-police.section1Intro: When using Projectude, we may collect the following data:
privacy-police.section1_2Item1: Actions performed on the platform (e.g., project creation, comments, invitations)
privacy-police.section1_2Item2: IP address, browser and device type
privacy-police.section1_3Item1: Projects and credentials entered by users
privacy-police.section2Item1: Ensure full functionality of the platform
privacy-police.section3Intro: Your data is not sold to third parties. We may share information:
privacy-police.section3Item1: With payment service providers (e.g., credit card gateways)
privacy-police.section3Item2: To fulfill legal, judicial, or regulatory obligations
privacy-police.section3Item3: With authorized collaborators in the projects you participate in
privacy-police.section4Intro: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, misuse, alteration, or destruction.
privacy-police.section4Item3: Controlled access to data by the technical team
privacy-police.section5Text: Your data will be retained as long as your account is active or as necessary to fulfill the described purposes. You may request the deletion of your account and data at any time.
privacy-police.section6Item1: Access the data we hold about you
privacy-police.section6Item3: Request the deletion of your data
privacy-police.section6Note: Requests must be made via email: help@projectude.com
privacy-police.section7Intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
privacy-police.section7Note: You can control the use of cookies in your browser settings.
privacy-police.section8Text: This policy may be updated periodically without prior notice. We recommend that you review this page regularly.
privacy-police.section9Intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
privacy-police.conclusion: By using Projectude, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

cookie-policy.title: Projectude Cookie Policy
cookie-policy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how the Projectude Platform uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our site (www.projectude.com). It details what cookies are, why we use them, and how you can control them.
cookie-policy.section1Text: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser or device when you visit a website. They serve to recognize your preferences, enhance your browsing experience, and collect analytical information.
cookie-policy.strictlyNecessaryText: These cookies are essential for the platform to function and cannot be disabled. They are used, for example, to:
cookie-policy.strictlyNecessaryItem1: Keep you logged into your account
cookie-policy.performanceText: They help us understand how users interact with Projectude, allowing us to:
cookie-policy.performanceItem1: Measure access numbers and browsing behavior
cookie-policy.performanceExample: Example: we use tools like Google Analytics with IP anonymization.
cookie-policy.functionalityText: They allow the platform to remember your choices to personalize your experience, such as:
cookie-policy.marketingItem1: Display personalized communications about updates or plans
cookie-policy.marketingItem2: Measure interactions with promotional campaigns (with your consent)
cookie-policy.section3Text: You can control and/or delete cookies at any time. To do so:
cookie-policy.section3Item1: Browser Settings: Adjust cookie permissions, block, or delete saved cookies.
cookie-policy.section4Text: We may use cookies from third-party services (e.g., Stripe, Firebase, Google) for authentication, payments, or analytics. These cookies are subject to the respective providers' privacy policies.
cookie-policy.section5Text: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in legislation or the platform itself. The updated version will always be published at:
cookie-policy.section6Text: If you have questions or requests regarding the use of cookies, please contact our team:
cookie-policy.finalNote: By continuing to use Projectude after viewing the cookie notice, you agree to the use as described in this policy.
